body_html: I think this is the usual and as such expectable behavior that when you don't provide an absolute/fully qualified path that it is treated as relative to the current working directory. So... yes, I think this should also be handled like this by TF.
body_text: I think this is the usual and as such expectable behavior that when you don't provide an absolute/fully qualified path that it is treated as relative to the current working directory. So... yes, I think this should also be handled like this by TF.
body: I think this is the usual and as such expectable behavior that when you don't provide an absolute/fully qualified path that it is treated as relative to the current working directory. So... yes, I think this should also be handled like this by TF.
